abstract: The chief operating officer of Facebook has signed the Giving Pledge, a campaign in which the world’s richest people vow to give away at least half their wealth.
snippet: The chief operating officer of Facebook has signed the Giving Pledge, a campaign in which the world’s richest people vow to give away at least half their wealth.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Late last year, the Facebook co-founder Mark Zuckerberg and his wife, Priscilla Chan, said they would donate 99 percent of their Facebook shares toward a new financial vehicle for charitable purposes.

headline.main: Sheryl Sandberg Said to Plan $100 Million in Charitable Giving
headline.print_headline: Sandberg Plans to Use $100 Million for Charity
